import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Check if Current User Follows Playlist"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/playlists/{{Playlist_Id}}/followers/contains"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Check to see if the current user is following one or more artists or other Spotify users.

**Note:** Authorization scopes- **user-follow-read**

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"Playlist_Id","description":"A comma-separated list of the artist or the user Spotify IDs to check. A maximum of 50 IDs can be sent in one request.","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
